person_first.description: Use person-first language when referring to people with disabilities

gender_neutral.description: Use inclusive language that doesn't assume gender

avoid_assumptions.description: Don't assume user capabilities, situations, or demographics

crazy.context: Use specific descriptors instead of mental health terms

insane.context: Avoid mental health terminology as intensifiers

blind_spot.context: Use neutral terms for areas of unawareness

guys.context: Use when addressing mixed or unknown gender groups

manpower.context: Use gender-neutral terms for human resources

chairman.context: Use neutral titles for leadership roles

native.context: Avoid when referring to software/features; respect Indigenous peoples

blacklist.context: Use neutral terms for blocked items

whitelist.context: Use neutral terms for approved items

decorative_images.rule: Use empty alt text (alt="") for purely decorative images

informative_images.rule: Describe the essential information the image conveys

examples.good: Chart showing 40% increase in user engagement

functional_images.rule: Describe the action or purpose, not the appearance

complex_images.rule: Provide brief alt text and link to detailed description

examples.process: Include full description in nearby text or linked page

gender_options.self_describe: Provide text field for self-description option

avoid_assumptions.rule: Don't assume name format or length
avoid_assumptions.single_field: Use single 'Full Name' field when possible

international_support.allow_unicode: Support names in all languages and scripts
international_support.no_validation: Don't validate name format or characters

international.country_first: Ask for country before other address fields

language_checklist: Does this make assumptions about abilities?
Does this respect all users equally?
accessibility_checklist: Is this scannable with short paragraphs?
Is important information conveyed in multiple ways?
Is error messaging helpful and non-judgmental?
cultural_sensitivity: Are holidays and events culturally neutral?
Is humor appropriate for global audiences?
Are assumptions about technology access avoided?

user_testing.diverse_participants: Include users with diverse abilities and backgrounds
user_testing.assistive_technology: Test with screen readers and other assistive devices
user_testing.cognitive_load: Test with users who have attention or processing differences

content_review.bias_detection: Review for unconscious bias in language and examples
content_review.translation_ready: Ensure content works well when translated
